overview: One summer trip. Two lesbian couples. One predator.  Sun, surf and sparkling seas set the scene for this torrid lesbian trip to a summer paradise. Watch waves of desire roll over long golden beaches, powerful boats and bronzed naked bodies. Viv Thomas' trademark dazzling beauties, deep kissing and delicious wet pussies make this the best release of 2012.  Join two beautiful blondes and three alluring brunettes on a sultry summer holiday, dripping with lust, that will make you ache for a sequel.  After watching Tides of Lust, it will not just be the sea that is wet!
title: Tides of Lust
